text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 18 in E-flat major, Op. 31, No. 3, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written between 1801 and 1802. The sonata is also called The Hunt.Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM.Ball, P. (2010) The Music Instinct, London, The Bodley Head The sonata is about 22 minutes long. ==Form== The sonata is in four sections, called movements: ==References== Category:Compositions in E-flat major Piano Sonata 018
title: Piano Sonata No. 18 (Beethoven)
